Joel Robinson (1915-2012) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na ónyé na-ese onyinyo. Ọ bụ ónyé mmepụta Africa America mbụ nke Museum of Modern Art nabatara na usoro ngosi Good Design ya na ónyé mbụ nwetara ọrụ ya màkà nchịkọta MoMA na-adịgide adịgide. Ihe osise ákwà Robinson bụ Ovals, nke e dèrè na ákwà linin, bụ akụkụ nke ihe ngosi MoMA nke 1951 Good Design. E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na mbipụta May 1952 nke magazin Ebony
